org.smartfrog.services.scripting
Interface RemoteScriptPrim

All Superinterfaces:
java.rmi.Remote
All Known Implementing Classes:
ScriptPrimImpl
public interface RemoteScriptPrim
extends java.rmi.Remote

A remote interface to trigger evaluation of scripts.

Method Summary
 java.lang.Object eval(java.lang.String script)
          Evaluate the String as a beanshell script
 void setRemote(java.lang.String name, java.lang.Object obj)
          Bind an object to a name in the beanshell interpreter.

eval

                      throws org.smartfrog.sfcore.common.SmartFrogException,
                             java.rmi.RemoteException
Evaluate the String as a beanshell script

Parameters:
script - the script as a string.
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - if the execution of the script fails.

setRemote

void setRemote(java.lang.String name,
               java.lang.Object obj)
               throws org.smartfrog.sfcore.common.SmartFrogException,
                      java.rmi.RemoteException
Bind an object to a name in the beanshell interpreter.

Parameters:
name - the name you want the object to be called in the interpreter
obj - the object you want to register in the interpreter.

org.smartfrog.sfcore.common.SmartFrogException
